trigger_prototype.expression: {Cedato Flume Monitoring via HTTP - Backup:flume.trapper.discovery["{#FLUME_METRICS_HOST}","{#FLUME_METRICS_PORT}","{#FLUME_METRICS_URI}","{#FLUME_INSTANCE}"].iregexp("failed: 0",#1)}=0 or {Cedato Flume Monitoring via HTTP - Backup:flume.trapper.discovery["{#FLUME_METRICS_HOST}","{#FLUME_METRICS_PORT}","{#FLUME_METRICS_URI}","{#FLUME_INSTANCE}"].iregexp("failed: 1",#1)}=1 or {Cedato Flume Monitoring via HTTP - Backup:flume.trapper.discovery["{#FLUME_METRICS_HOST}","{#FLUME_METRICS_PORT}","{#FLUME_METRICS_URI}","{#FLUME_INSTANCE}"].iregexp("failed: 2",#1)}=1 or {Cedato Flume Monitoring via HTTP - Backup:flume.trapper.discovery["{#FLUME_METRICS_HOST}","{#FLUME_METRICS_PORT}","{#FLUME_METRICS_URI}","{#FLUME_INSTANCE}"].iregexp("failed: 3",#1)}=1 or {Cedato Flume Monitoring via HTTP - Backup:flume.trapper.discovery["{#FLUME_METRICS_HOST}","{#FLUME_METRICS_PORT}","{#FLUME_METRICS_URI}","{#FLUME_INSTANCE}"].iregexp("failed: 4",#1)}=1 or {Cedato Flume Monitoring via HTTP - Backup:flume.trapper.discovery["{#FLUME_METRICS_HOST}","{#FLUME_METRICS_PORT}","{#FLUME_METRICS_URI}","{#FLUME_INSTANCE}"].iregexp("failed: 5",#1)}=1 or {Cedato Flume Monitoring via HTTP - Backup:flume.trapper.discovery["{#FLUME_METRICS_HOST}","{#FLUME_METRICS_PORT}","{#FLUME_METRICS_URI}","{#FLUME_INSTANCE}"].iregexp("failed: 6",#1)}=1 or {Cedato Flume Monitoring via HTTP - Backup:flume.trapper.discovery["{#FLUME_METRICS_HOST}","{#FLUME_METRICS_PORT}","{#FLUME_METRICS_URI}","{#FLUME_INSTANCE}"].iregexp("failed: 7",#1)}=1 or {Cedato Flume Monitoring via HTTP - Backup:flume.trapper.discovery["{#FLUME_METRICS_HOST}","{#FLUME_METRICS_PORT}","{#FLUME_METRICS_URI}","{#FLUME_INSTANCE}"].iregexp("failed: 8",#1)}=1 or {Cedato Flume Monitoring via HTTP - Backup:flume.trapper.discovery["{#FLUME_METRICS_HOST}","{#FLUME_METRICS_PORT}","{#FLUME_METRICS_URI}","{#FLUME_INSTANCE}"].iregexp("failed: 9",#1)}=1
